name: 47 Insights Inc
tagline: Grow your business with smarter marketing
description:
47 Insights is a B2B digital marketing agency specializing in profitable lead generation, nurturing and conversion. 
We deliver marketing strategies, digital marketing campaigns, outsourced marketing and training to a small and exclusive roster of international clients.
Our sector expertise includes SaaS and Technology Firms, Professional Services companies and Industrial/Manufacturing sector.
Our mission is to provide positive marketing results via a personal service that is honest, accountable and responsive.
